short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert the URL on the browser to a QR code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is used to convert the URL from the browser on your laptop/desktop to a QR code which you can then scan using your phone/tablet, and continue where you left off. If you're not signed in to your browser and your tabs aren't syncing between devices, this could be a great replacement.
